sect2.title: Installation of Libksba
sect2.para: Install Libksba by running the following commands:

screen.userinput:
./configure --prefix=/usr && make &&
makeinfo --html --no-split -o doc/ksba_nochunks.html doc/ksba.texi && makeinfo --plaintext -o doc/ksba.txt doc/ksba.texi

sect2.para: If you wish to build alternate formats of the documentation, you must have or installed, then issue the following commands:

screen.userinput: tex --output-directory=doc ksba.texi && dvips -o doc/ksba.ps doc/ksba.dvi && make -C doc pdf html

sect2.para: To test the results, issue: make check.

screen.userinput:
make install &&
install -v -m755 -d /usr/share/doc/libksba-&libksba-version; && install -v -m644 README doc/ksba{_nochunks.html,.txt,.texi} \ /usr/share/doc/libksba-&libksba-version;
